EmailTemplate.name: HC-Hyper Consumption Initial Follow-up
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Thank you for your order request.
The quantity you requested for part number <enter part number> exceeds our normal demand for this part. We will review your requirement and advise support options with lead-times as soon as possible.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
